no.hig.hers.ludoclient

Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • no.hig.hers.ludoclient.Main

  • public class Main
extends javafx.application.Application
    The main method of the client. This is where the client is started.
    Author:
    Daniel on 03.11.2015

        public void start(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
        Start method of the main class. Initialize logger and internationalization. It sets up scenes and connect to the server.

      • sendLogin

        public static void sendLogin(java.lang.String code,
                             java.lang.String username,
                             java.lang.String password)
        Method for sending the login info to the server. Run from the login screen (ClientLoginUIController)
        Parameters:
        code - the LoginCode.
        username - the username to send
        password - the password to send

      • sendText

        public static void sendText(java.lang.String textToSend)
        Method used to send a message to the server. Handled in a separate method to ensure that all messages are ended with a newline character and are flushed (ensure they are sent.)
        Parameters:
        textToSend - the message to send to the server

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Method for stopping the client, sending a message of logout to the server.

        stop in class javafx.application.Application
